original_text: And he sent them to Lebanon, ten thousand a month by courses: a month they were in Lebanon, and two months at home: and Adoniram was over the levy.
korean_text: 솔로몬이 그들을 한 달에 만 명씩 번갈아 레바논으로 보내매 그들이 한 달은 레바논에 있고 두 달은 집에 있으며 아도니람은 감독이 되었고

sentences.original_text: And he sent them to Lebanon
ten thousand a month by courses
a month they were in Lebanon
sentences.korean_translation: 한 달 동안 그들은 레바논에 있었고

sentences.original_text: and Adoniram was over the levy
